text: @realDonaldTrump @KatrinaPierson @FoxNews Feb. 28, at a campaign rally in South Carolina,Trump likened Democrats' criticism of his administration's response to the coronavirus outbreak to their efforts to impeach him, saying "this is their new hoax." He downplayed the severity of the outbreak, comparing it to the flu.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
